section.name: Jakarta Regexp
section.title: Jakarta Regexp
section.p: Jakarta previously hosted Regexp, a 100% Pure Java Regular Expression package.
As there were no new features or releases planned, the Jakarta Regexp project was retired in April 2011.
Jakarta Regexp users are encouraged to use similar features in newer Java versions, such as java.util.regexp
The old Jakarta Regexp website is available online here for archival purposes only.
Archived versions of Jakarta Regexp may be downloaded from the Apache Archives.
